name: fanged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A fanged creature has fangs (= long, sharp teeth): a fanged and clawed carnivore The brass handle was made in the shape of a snake's gaping, fanged mouth.
More examplesFewer examplesHe told a dramatic tale about being attacked by a fanged monster.The pre-Columbian, 2,500-year-old textile fragments depict fanged, godlike figures.He shows us a rat-size fanged spider.Godzilla is depicted as a huge, fanged, roaring gorilla.
